org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components

Class Cranks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.BaseComponent
      • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.Cranks
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeSetOwner

    public class Cranks
extends BaseComponent
    Cranks component of the Bicycle. This component attaches at the bottom bracket point calculated in the frame.
